dict.string:
<script>


  function myCallback(hypeDocument, element, event) {
    window.myhypedocument = hypeDocument;
  }
  
  if("HYPE_eventListeners" in window === false) {
    window.HYPE_eventListeners = Array();
  }
  window.HYPE_eventListeners.push({"type":"HypeDocumentLoad", "callback":myCallback});
  
 </script>
	<style>
	@font-face {
	font-family: 'gelIconsFontCSS';
	src:url('${resourcesFolderName}/gelIconsFontCSS.eot?har4cc');
	src:url('${resourcesFolderName}/gelIconsFontCSS.eot?#iefixhar4cc') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('${resourcesFolderName}/gelIconsFontCSS.woff?har4cc') format('woff'),
		url('${resourcesFolderName}/gelIconsFontCSS.ttf?har4cc') format('truetype'),
		url('${resourcesFolderName}/gelIconsFontCSS.svg?har4cc#gelIconsFontCSS') format('svg');
	font-weight: normal;
	font-style: normal;
}

/* btn */
#transform {
  margin-left : 155px;
}.menu {
	position: relative;
	display:  inline-block;
	top : -16px;
	left : -1px;
}
.menu span {
	margin: 0 auto;
	position: relative;
	top: 12px;
}
.menu span:before, .menu span:after {
	position: absolute;
	content: '';
}
.menu span, .menu span:before, .menu span:after {
	width: 16px;
	height: 3px;
	padding-right: 4px;
	background-color: #fff;
	.border-radius(5px, 5px, 5px, 5px);
	display: block;
}

.menu.cross span, .menu.cross span:before, .menu.cross span:after {
	width: 18px;
	height: 3px;
	}
	
.menu span:before {
	margin-top: -6px;
}
.menu span:after {
	margin-top: 6px;
}

.burger span {
	-webkit-transition-duration:0s;
	   -moz-transition-duration:0s;
	     -o-transition-duration:0s;
	        transition-duration:0s;
	-webkit-transition-delay:.2s;
	   -moz-transition-delay:.2s;
	     -o-transition-delay:.2s;
	        transition-delay:.2s;
}
.burger span:before {
	-webkit-transition-property:margin, -webkit-transform;
	   -moz-transition-property:margin, -moz-transform;
	     -o-transition-property:margin, -o-transform;
	        transition-property:margin, transform;
	-webkit-transition-duration:.2s;
	   -moz-transition-duration:.2s;
	     -o-transition-duration:.2s;
	        transition-duration:.2s;
	-webkit-transition-delay:.2s, 0;
	   -moz-transition-delay:.2s, 0;
	     -o-transition-delay:.2s, 0;
	        transition-delay:.2s, 0;
}
.burger span:after {
	-webkit-transition-property:margin, -webkit-transform;
	   -moz-transition-property:margin, -moz-transform;
	     -o-transition-property:margin, -o-transform;
	        transition-property:margin, transform;
	-webkit-transition-duration:.2s;
	   -moz-transition-duration:.2s;
	     -o-transition-duration:.2s;
	        transition-duration:.2s;
	-webkit-transition-delay:.2s, 0;
	   -moz-transition-delay:.2s, 0;
	     -o-transition-delay:.2s, 0;
	        transition-delay:.2s, 0;
}
.cross span {
	background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.0);
	-webkit-transition-delay:.2s;
	   -moz-transition-delay:.2s;
	     -o-transition-delay:.2s;
	        transition-delay:.2s;
}
.cross span:after {
	margin-top: 0;
	-webkit-transition-delay:0, .2s;
	   -moz-transition-delay:0, .2s;
	     -o-transition-delay:0, .2s;
	        transition-delay:0, .2s;
	-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	   -moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	    -ms-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	     -o-transform:rotate(-45deg);
	        transform:rotate(-45deg);
}
.cross span:before {
	margin-top: 0;
	-webkit-transition-delay:0, .2s;
	   -moz-transition-delay:0, .2s;
	     -o-transition-delay:0, .2s;
	        transition-delay:0, .2s;
	-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);
	   -moz-transform:rotate(45deg);
	    -ms-transform:rotate(45deg);
	     -o-transform:rotate(45deg);
	        transform:rotate(45deg);
}

	</style>
